name: Roboglitch
description: He needs to escape.

name: Q-Linq
description: Q-Linq is a VR game where skill and story merge into a skill-based adventure. It's a fresh take on the bubble-pop / match-3 genres. Solve challenging physics-driven puzzles with quick thinking, precision aim, and strategic prowess.

name: Exitus
description: You woke up, and you have no idea where you are. What a coincidence, you don't remember anything at all; could you have been kidnapped? There is only one way to find out.

name: Sliced
description: "Sliced" is an exhilarating PvP game where players engage in deadly combat, wielding axes and spears to strategically dismember opponents in a fierce arena. Master the lethal art of combat in this relentless, blood-soaked death fest.

name: Click To Ten 3D
description: the number rises, in 3D

name: Blister Blight
description: A robot assassin fuses with a noble mechanic. Take the role of Blister Blight as you confront your fellow rulers of Ridgescar. Repair or destroy? Wreck or Reform? The Blights await their fate!

name: Netcode Warriors
description: ⁤Dive into the datascape of 'Netcode Warriors', an anime-style arena fighter designed from the ground up to take competitive play to its limits. Engage in intense 1-v-1 fights, master unique characters and playstyles, then take your skills to the arena. ⁤

name: Re:Ark
description: RE:Ark is a fast-paced and deadly action-shooter in crisp monochrome palette. Cleave your path through insane inhabitants of the station. Transform your abilities and learn dark origins of the tragedy that happened on The Ark.

name: Flash Diving
description: Short horror game where you survey the descent of a capsule through a hole in the middle of an ocean, with only 4 lights and your ears to ensure your surroundings remain clear.

name: Project Bubblegum
description: Journey through the galaxy as a squad of space rangers in this dynamic, co-op action-arcade game for up to 4 players! Explore multiple planets and experience plenty of drama as you take part in this online or local couch co-op epic space adventure.

name: Asyle
description: Lose yourself in Asyle's open world environment to catalogue and tame wondrous creatures called Zoa. Explore the world and with the help of a team of Zoa you've befriended along the way, document the wildlife and uncover the nature of the mysterious catastrophic storms.

name: Duck, Duck, Shoot
description: In this action roguelike shooter you lead an flock of ducks in a vibrant 3D isometric world. Your feathered friends will follow your every move, unleashing their unique attacks on your foes. Navigate through challenging landscapes and face formidable bosses as you upgrade your ducks along the way.

name: Return
description: Return is an anime-style platformer-hack-and-slash game where an agent works for an organization that makes contracts with the government to take down any threat.

name: Roshamboss
description: A 3v1 party game where 3 heroes team up to battle 1 raid boss in a superpowered game of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

name: Nazizombie's Slayer
description: Immerse yourself in a top-down pixel shooter. Play as an adamantite mercenary and follow the course of events taking place in an alternate universe.

name: Gug
description: Gug is a roguelike creature-battler which mods its own functionality. Build your team, counter your foes' strengths, and evolve game-breaking powers defined by any word you choose!

name: Embers of the Evening
description: The oil is running out. The expedition is doomed. You will never reach the lighthouse. But something worse than death awaits you if you give up. Operate the engine. Explore the ship. Unveil the truth that lies beyond your reality.

name: Hopwander
description: Embark on a journey above the clouds in this small cozy game. Guide a charming frog through puzzles, face scary monsters and engage in conversations with quirky characters. Your froggy adventure begins now!

name: Awful Marco Bros
description: Awful Marco Bros is a short game where you play as the enemies and try to beat the protagonist.

name: Holiday Motel Simulator
description: Step into the role of an owner of a neglected motel waiting for a second chance. Begin your journey from scratch, planning and executing a comprehensive renovation of the property. Make your best and transform the motel into an oasis of comfort, ready to welcome the most discerning travelers.

name: Intown Nightmares
description: A horror almanac that tells the story of events in the city of Intown, built around a science station. The town is caught up by nightmares that in the future will affect the lives of every resident, follow how the impact of the nightmares on Intown will change over time.

name: Space Empires I
description: Space Empires I is the first chapter of the Space Empires series. A classic galactic conquest and turn-based strategy video game where you are the leader of a race of intelligent beings building large spaceships for interplanetary and interstellar travel through warp points between star systems.

name: Terrors of War
description: Step into the heart of WW2 mayhem! Lead a variety of unique units into epic battles, master supply logistics, and unleash devastating strikes on your foes. Be part of this ambitious early-access project and help shape the game's growth and evolution!

name: Foster The Monster
description: Explore different planets daily to find and capture Fosmons, including action-adventure elements. Collect random cards each day and choose your cards to find the best deck-building strategy for Fosmon research. maximize Fosmon development and strengthen the player to protect Earth from Fosmons.

name: Oathborne
description: Oathborne is a top down action roguelite hack and slash. Unlock new skills for your class as you delve deeper into treacherous dungeons with traps, bosses, puzzles, and hordes of enemies. Each dive into darkness contains a monolith which must be destroyed to open pathways in the overworld.

name: Silver World
description: Silver World is a game where you become a player transported to another world, defeating silver-colored enemies that attack within the VR experience

name: Mugged
description: "Mugged" is a thrilling multiplayer PVP game set in a cartoon bank heist scenario. Players are split into Muggers and Police, each with distinct objectives. Muggers aim to stealthily steal the bank's gold, while Police strive to stop them.

name: Bridgelands
description: Bridgelands is a sandbox style story game. Navigate the communities and islands around the uniquely generated world as you help build them back up by solving their problems. Face unique environments, creatures, boss fights, and shape your islands in this voxel-based world.

name: Bladeborne
description: Delve into Bladeborne's medieval fantasy world, a CO-OP RPG adventure with battles, quests, and more! Join on this epic journey alone or with friends!

name: Claria's Great Maze
description: Behind the Claria's Great Maze is the last village of humanity, and the maze is also the last barrier for humans to block enemies. And you are the last guardian of magic, the last hope of humanity.

name: Laser Lightshow
description: A board manipulation laser-bouncing puzzle game, featuring a level editor, pack editor, and hundreds of handcrafted levels!

name: Neon Rush
description: Speed through a neon city in this 2D retro racing game. Outsmart cops and rivals with skillful maneuvers. Immerse yourself in illegal racing, fueled by synthwave beats, and dominate as the underworld's top racer!

name: Slap The King
description: Go fast and slap kings.

name: Escape Darkness
description: Escape Darkness: Survive the castle full of blood and mystery. Investigate rooms, follow clues and solve terrible secrets to find your way out of the castle. Feel the tension, gather your courage and fight to escape the dark world.

name: Suika Pets
description: Suika Pets is the adorable puzzle game where you combine your pets to grow your score without overflowing their container!

name: Shadow City Mysteries: A Clockwork Noir
description: Shadow City Mysteries is a narrative adventure game in which players take on the role of a detective investigating a Mystery. Or is it a Conspiracy? Or is it a Supernatural Thriller? Experience the story multiple times to discover a story and world bigger than they suspected existed.

name: Ion.A
description: Non-linear graphic novel in the genre of magical realism. Will the hero be able to uncover secrets, find himself and escape from danger? Or will he be lost in the streets of the City forever?

name: Poor Artifact Maker
description: The Poor Artifact Maker is a tower defense game based on Chinese fairy legends. The refiner has to explore the dangerous world in order to find his lost companion. The only way to overcome the endless ferocious beasts in the wilderness is to keep collecting materials to refine spiritual weapons

name: Road To Valhalla: Carola
description: A 2D retro game based on the lore of the Spanish Streamer Carola. In this adventure you will travel through a fantasy world exploring platform levels, completing missions and defeating enemies alongside powerful bosses.

name: Atlantis Heroes: Rise of the Lost Land
description: Dive into Atlantis Heroes, an online multiplayer with stunning graphics and innovative gameplay. Choose diverse characters, unleash groundbreaking skills, and compete in thrilling esports. Every moment is a chance to redefine your gaming adventure!

name: Surviving Ceres
description: Surviving Ceres is an open world survival game with an emphasis on crafting and base building. Export rare materials and manufactured goods to earn funding used to unlock new technologies and upgrades. Bring in colonists from earth to work advanced facilities to terraform the planet.

name: Hell's Scream
description: Go back in time with an old school shooter game. Imagine yourself in a violent world where mass slaughter cannot be prevented. All you can do is survive, and that's not going to be easy.

name: Sweets Inc
description: Create a confectionery empire in Sweets Inc, the business management simulation game where you take the helm of your very own sweets manufacturing company. Design delectable treats, build and manage your factories, and market your products across the continent to become an industry tycoon!

name: Lucid
description: Lucid is a fast-paced, retro-style first-person shooter that thrusts you into a surreal world. Battle against eerie mannequin rulers in a high-adrenaline, violence-packed journey. Explore shifting dimensions in a pixelated dreamscape that blurs the line between reality and imagination.

name: Roots of Fury
description: In this action packed RPG you play a scientist that shrunk herself to defeat insects that are eating the roots of her plants. The scientist enlists the help of an ant hive, where she has her base and can also craft weapons.

name: Peppermint Falls
description: Peppermint Falls is a farming simulator set in an enchanting world of sweets. Cultivate delightful candy plants, explore the world with your whimsical pancake house companion, forge friendships with charming confectionary inhabitants, and discover fabled mysteries!

name: Jobsworth Weekly
description: Congratulations! As an upstanding member of the community, and since Simon had a stroke last Friday, you have been made the interim editor-in-chief of our fine village newsletter, Jobsworth Weekly.

name: Faded
description: Welcome to FADED – a visually stunning walking simulator with puzzle elements that takes you on an emotional journey through solitude and the daily struggle against

name: Exterminator
description: Exterminator is a Fast-Paced, High Octane Action Third Person Shooter, Inspired By Armored Core & Vanquish, Destroy Hard Bosses, Get Their Armaments ,Modify Armaments, Destroy Hordes of Robots ,Solve Puzzles, Learn New Skills , Try Different Builds & Customize Your Robot.

name: King of The Hill
description: "King Of The Hill" is a top-down survival game where you have to defend your castle from enemies. Hire knights and heroes, improve them and your economy, fight different enemies and set records for time.

name: Atoners: The Lost Epoch
description: Saving the world can also lead to wealth! Braves, eliminate all demons, and their dungeons will definitely sell for a good price. Then, replace them with more expensive shining armor and move towards the next dungeon!

name: Reign
description: A competitive six-player card game in an FFA format for cynics of thinking strategically, intellectual challenge seekers, and those who want to play something special.

name: Empire FactionWar
description: Immerse yourself in an epic world where you control a faction and fight for dominance of several cities. Strategy, economic management and military tactics are essential to achieve victory. From growing your cities' economies to upgrading your troops with weapons and equipment.

name: I, Chatbot: Aisylum
description: Probably one of first games in which you talk to real AIs! There are seven chatbots in the AISYLUM, the sanatorium for crazy AIs. And one of them is YOU! An small, experimental, educational indie "talking simulator", powered by generative AI on your PC.

name: Novark
description: You crash land on Novark during a rescue mission. With hostile aliens in a war, nowhere is safe and everything is out to kill you. Fight to survive. Discover secrets. Fight epic bosses. Progress through the story. Survive and escape Novark!

name: Angry Robot Girlfriend
description: Angry Robot Girlfriend is a fast paced third person shooter in which your survival, memorization, and shooting skills are put to the test while you aim to accomplish your goal of many different paths leading to one solution.

name: In Misery: Episode 1 - The Farm
description: Lost on an unfamiliar back road in one of the most remote parts of Missouri, you stop in a small town called Misery for help, but what you find is much worse. In the single-player, exploratory, horror anthology series "In Misery", your main goal is simple: make it out alive.

name: Core Awakening
description: A top-down retro rogue-like. Explore a world that is slowly being corrupted by an unknown entity. Play solo or up to 4-players. Pick a class and discover, collect and modify dozens of different guns, abilities and upgrades. Find the source of Corruption and stop it from spreading.

name: Become Castellane in Another World
description: This gameplay is a virsual novel game developed according to the anime with same name of "Become Castellane in Another World", which enclude enriched plot branch options to provide more funs during the jouney in another world by following the key role, to enjoy the journey with funs and happiness.

name: Secret School
description: Uncover the secrets of the school, solve puzzles, and decipher secrets. Boldly explore corridors and rooms, but be on guard - challenges and riddles await at every step. Time waits for no one, the adventure begins!

name: Call Hating 2000
description: A "mildly infuriating" first person adventure game with humorous narration where you use 90s tech to overcome an evil AI and make it to work on time.

name: Helios Horizon
description:
In Helios Horizon you play as a robot mercenary, built and employed by Helios Horizon Inc.

Annihilate endless hordes of aliens in this action-packed sci-fi roguelite to fulfill your mission. For every mission completed, and every monster slain, Helios Horizon rewards its employees. Choose between upgrades to firearms or equipment to be an even more devastating mercenary.

Even if you are destroyed, the company will reassemble you. Helios Horizon cares about its property. Your upgrades will be preserved. With every death you will become stronger.

name: MemoryBombs
description: Simple memory game. Play against time and challenge your memory, avoiding the bombs finding one will mess up your game. Get some cool icons and letters!

name: Iskelonia
description: Crafting, plants, insects, mushrooms, ruins, in a semi-textual game

name: Powerup Humans
description: Can you craft the perfect mindscape defense and help your person reach the breakthrough that will powerup their future? Enter the minds of ordinary people and prepare for a fast paced strategic battle that could change their lives forever!

name: Parallel Plague: Good Old Days
description: "Parallel Plague: Good Old Days" redefines gaming excellence as a standout entry at the 2024 Steam FPS Festival. Experience the hybrid FPS and TPS gameplay in a post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies, offering a unique blend of action and strategy for an extraordinary adventure.

name: All Cats 'r Belong To Us
description: In All the cats are belong you will start off your quest with a small band of adventurers aiming to get back your precious cats. By slaying monsters and gathering experience, you will be able to upgrade your adventurers, gain more allies and, maybe, even gain a small foothold in the game world.

name: Liekki
description: Liekki is a fast-paced puzzle platformer where you play as a little fire spirit and try to burn as much as possible – or as little as possible. Solve levels using different fire related powers and change levels while burning them down.

name: Stickman WW2
description: Join the historic battles of World War II in the new game Stickman WW2

name: Submersed 2: The Hive
description: Submersed 2: The Hive is a first-person science-fiction horror game, set in the harrowing depths of the Atlantic Ocean.Face the horror of being submerged at the bottom of the ocean.

name: Dice Birth Road
description: Dice Birth Road is an independent single player Rogue turn based deck building game. Faced with powerful enemies, you need to fully utilize dice card management to manage your hand and defeat them. Defeat all enemies and explore the story behind the game.

name: Wits Battle Simulator
description: This is a 3D multiplayer online cooperative confrontation strategy game. You can cooperate or compete for the final victory. The game has many classic and innovative gameplays built in. Players can also use the editor to create their own wits games and upload them with Play with friends.

name: Cazzarion: Astro Bouncer
description: Sin descripción

name: Miner Rogue
description: An open-world crafting roguelike voxel based where everything is destructible and randomly generated, daylight is for exploring, mining rare minerals, forging powerful weapons, and building your fortress. As the sun sets, monsters emerge to attack your base.

name: Ace Attorney Online
description: AAO is the first place to play, create and share adventure games, using gameplay elements from Capcom's Ace Attorney series.

name: TimeSplitters Next
description:
TimeSplitters Next was a project in development by Free Radical Design before the studio was closed down by its parent company Embracer Group.

Developers who worked on the project said it started off as a Fortnite clone before morphing into an expanded alternate universe take on the classic TimeSplitters 2.

name: Clandestine: The Hidden Truth
description: "Clandestine: The Hidden Truth" is a first-person psychological horror game. Investigate a family homicide, manipulate reality with polaroids, and solve puzzles to unveil chilling secrets hidden within this enigmatic home of horrors. Will you come back unscathed?

name: Bios Fear
description: It's up to you to save what's left of humanity from its own greed and corporate profit motives. What little remains of Earth's ecosystem is protected within giant biodomes, and the dome systems are failing. Can you find a way to fix them before all life on Earth dies?"

name: Exterminator
description: Sin descripción

name: Nizhan Future
description: Nizhan Future is Tencent Games’ upcoming sci-fi shooter title. Under the development of TiMi Studios, the game will take you on a futuristic adventure with multiple game modes on offer.

name: The Night Wanderer
description:
"The Night Wanderer" is a hybrid of RPG and soulslike genres, characterized by unique solutions and an innovative approach to tried-and-true mechanics. The game utilizes level design known from Metroidvania games and a combat system native to soulsborne productions, which emphasizes dynamic yet tactical gameplay.

The game is based on the award-winning fantasy novel "Lord of the Ice Garden" by Jarosław Grzędowicz.

name: Banjo-Kazooie in Super Mario 64
description: A mod which adds Super Mario 64 levels into Banjo-Kazooie.

name: On the Move
description: Sin descripción

name: My Favorite Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: My Dream Day
description: Sin descripción

name: Marvel Super-Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: Looney Tunes
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Story Book
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Coloring Book
description: Sin descripción

name: A Trip To The Zoo
description: Sin descripción

name: Video Art Activity Cartridge
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghost Master: Complete Edition
description: Ghost Master: Complete Edition aims to add back all the cut content from the game, including ghosts and levels.

name: School Of Love: Clubs!
description: School Of Love: Clubs! is a high quality Dating Sim/Visual Novel game. There are so many things you can do in the game and many more such as easter eggs, secret objects, cards etc. This will be an amazing journey.

name: Passage
description: A little game about childhood, secrets, and memories. Based on a true-ish story.

name: Star Wars Galaxies: Evolve
description: A non-profit, fan-made, community-driven remaster of the classic MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided.

name: Fallout: Yesterday
description: Fallout: Yesterday is a fan-made recreation of the canceled Black Isle's Fallout 3 (Van Buren) on the engine of Fallout 2.

name: Jigsaw Explorer
description: Welcome! Jigsaw Explorer was created with the intent of providing jigsaw puzzle enthusiasts with a great selection of high quality, family friendly online jigsaw puzzles. We have thousands of hand picked puzzles available and new puzzles being added every day.

name: Dragons and Nature
description: With powerful dragons and relatively weak animals, you can easily destroy the natural ecology, but you will eventually suffer backlash. Learning to coexist may be the key to long-term survival.

name: Deep Into Darkness
description: Deep Into Darkness is a horror game that features a cursed environment where you wake up with no knowledge of your surroundings. While you are explore the abandoned building you found yourself in some crazy situations, being chased by monstrous creatures, while discovering the truth.

name: Plunder Defense
description: Plunder Defense is a first person tower defense game about looting islands. Build and upgrade towers, fend off enemies with unique weapons and abilities, and collect that sweet, sweet gold to make your mark as a legendary pirate!

name: Dungeons & Dimensions
description: Dungeons & Dimensions is a Looter Souls-Like made with Coop in mind. Travel through interesting Worlds and Dungeons alone or with friends, and gather epic loot on the way ! Beware the Simulation is unforgiving.

name: Saltaria
description: Enter the oceanic world of Saltaria. Build, manage and expand your steam ship. Explore islands surrounded by a vast creepy ocean covering a subterranean world inspired by Jules Verne. Hunt for legendary power crystals to empower weapons or to build fantastic machines that fight or work for you.

name: Occult Mingle
description: Connect with four occult enthusiasts (and possibly sell your soul) in this macabre LGBTQ+ horror visual novel/interface drama dating sim.

name: Tokyo Xanadu New Project
description:
Set in the Japanese city of Kyoto, this new game depicts the story of juveniles who travel around the otherworldly realm known as “Xanadu.”

While it shares the same world as Tokyo Xanadu, which is set in the Japanese city of Tokyo, the setting is all-new. It is currently in development as a “completely new title” with all game systems built from the ground up.

name: Star Wars: Rebel Warrior
description: An unreleased Star Wars game which would’ve had the player taking on the role of a Wookie fighting the Imperial Forces. After being pitched to George Lucas, he turned down the idea believing a Wookie wouldn’t make an ideal protagonist due to only making grunts and barks.

name: Star Wars: Smuggler
description: An unreleased Star Wars game which would’ve had you taking on the role of a Smuggler in an imperial dominated galaxy, with the goal being to buy and sell items for high and low prices whilst being at the risk of entangling with Imperial Forces.

name: Super Mario Bros. CD
description: Super Mario Bros. CD (SMBCD) is a ROM hack of Super Mario World, imagining what an SMB game might be like on a CD-based console.

name: Wizards
description: A cancelled sequel to the Game Boy Color game Warlocked which was meant for the Game Boy Advance.

name: We Are The Mods
description: An unreleased spiritual successor to The Warriors set in 1960s England during the mods and rockers brawls that was intended for the PlayStation 2 and later Xbox 360 before being scrapped entirely.

name: Martha generator
description: about 20 marthas are generated and recycled each day in the middle of the ocean

name: Symphony Stride
description: Launch powerful combos in this fast and exciting deckbuilder roguelike. Choose two characters to form a team with unique combos for each pairing and embark on a procedurally generated quest of epic proportions!

name: Steel Executor
description: Get your bloody vengeance in this fast-paced techno-fueled top-down shooter. One Hit - One Kill. Become the perfect killer machine, master a multitude of weapons, upgrade your body, hack the world around you... and take away everything from those who put you in the grave!

name: My Pretty Closet
description: Embark on a forest stroll with your grandfather, only to awaken alone in a eerie cabin. Unveil buried memories, revealing parental secrets. Confront inner demons of depression and anxiety and seek for answers and peace in this unsettling yet serene psychological horror game.

name: Fear Faith
description: Wield your sword in the right direction to defeat challenging horrors. Try to make sense of your steps through an impossible tower that changes with your decisions while trying to survive. Prove your Faith.

name: Relic
description: An action-adventure game, Relic has a unique storyline and environment with a pixel art style.

name: World Air War
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey into the heart of aerial warfare with World Air War

name: Echo Weaver
description: A fast-paced metroidBRAINia that tells the tale of a ruined society trapped in a fatal time loop. Uncover their story - and your own - as you explore what remains. Use each loop to chip away at the mystery, unlocking powerful knowledge to reshape the timeline and master the loop.

name: F-Zero GX Demake Overdrive
description:
This is a fusion between 2 mods f-zero zx overdrive + the f-zero gx demake
This hack is focused in 2000km/h+ races, custom stats, new stats
and new machines and of course new custom tracks.

name: Become The Moon
description: Become The Moon is a roguelike deckbuilder and auto-battler mashup where players build powerful teams of minions from a deck they construct as they play. Will you save the moon from corruption, or embrace the chaos and become it?

description: Sin descripción

name: Solar Raiders
description: Suit up, grab your guns, and embark on a cosmic heist in this fast-paced bullet-hell roguelite. Solo or with friends, your goal is to overcome enemy packed dungeons and steal the Solar Core. Raid, loot, unlock powerful skills, create unstoppable builds and prepare to die.

name: The Berlin Apartment
description: The Berlin Apartment tells the moving stories of inhabitants of an apartment in the city of Berlin over the last 120 years in several unique, emotional episodes as a character-driven adventure game.

name: The Bibites: Digital Life
description: Explore real digital life in The Bibites! Play god as you guide your bibites on their evolutionary journey. Analyze their Neural Network brains and genetic information as they adapt to their environments. Save your favorites and test their strength in Challenge Mode!

name: The Black Siege
description: The Black Plague had ravaged 14th Century Europe, turning humans into carnivorous monsters that brought destruction to the continent. Your kingdom stands as the last bastion. Build your fortress, mine resources and train troops to hold out until help arrives in this builder-defense roguelike.

name: The Dark Plague: Trials Of Galwefeld
description: Survive a relentless pursuit by a terrifying entity in this top-down horror adventure. Explore a dark and atmospheric world, gather parts to craft a weapon, and face your fears in a thrilling showdown. Can you escape the fate of becoming one of them?

name: The Chancellor's Plot
description: After receiving a letter from a wealthy and powerful benefactor, you journey into the depths of an abandoned mansion to recover a mysterious artifact. But soon you will learn the reason this place has been abandoned.

name: The Collector
description: A third-person action-adventure game with horror elements.

name: The Forest Ranger
description: The Forest Ranger (TFR) is a psychological horror game where you take the role of a ranger and paranormal things happen

name: The End of Humanity
description: Survival and construction at the end of zombies, rebuilding homes or becoming plunderers, witnessing the extinction and struggle of human nature

name: The Farmer & the Chicken
description: Unleash the chicken's power and escape in this arcade adventure to avoid being caught by the farmer!

name: The Drylands
description: Create the perfect team and car to traverse through The Drylands fighting for loot and discovering traces of a lost civilization, while an ancient growing power further shapes the world in its image.

name: The Emperor
description: "The Emperor" is a simulation game for dynasty cultivation. In the game, as the master of the divine realm, you can work hard to conquer the world, expand your territory, and govern the world. You can also cultivate education and benefit the people. Come and establish your kingdom's hegemony.

name: The Green Room Experiment: Episode 3
description: You're locked in a dream and you need to wake up. Unravel the mysteries of this surreal exploration series and immerse yourself in a dreamlike, strange and solitary universe.

name: The hardest game in the universe 2: Final DLC
description: Prepare for the ultimate test of skill and determination with the "Ultimate Challenge" DLC for "The Hardest Game in the Universe 2"! This expansion takes the difficulty to unprecedented heights, introducing over 20 new levels designed to push even the most seasoned players to their limits.

name: The Goose Tale
description: You are a simple and vulnerable goose with a mortal mission, steal and escape from the bigest organization on the planet. The Goose Tale is a 3D platform game, where you will use skills and make easier your escape from the organization.

name: The Legend Of Perchta
description: The Legend of Perchta is a fast FPS with roguelite elements in a fantasy world. Find and defeat the Devil himself with God-given magic powers. Unlock new heroes, collect spells, upgrade magic wands and craft powerful magic runes to fight your way through waves of monsters.

name: The Last Days of Friendship Valley
description: A deckbuilding narrative RPG about conflict negotiation, goats, and impending doom. Make your own goat character, navigate arguments with cards, uncover an ancient mystery, and try to save the world.

name: The Last Child
description: Discover the stunning world of The Last Child. In it you will enjoy the beauty of the world, its deepest darkness and its brightest light. A side view will allow you to concentrate on the world and its characters. Your adventure, your decision can change it.

name: The Last Camp 1990
description: The Last Camp 1990 is a horror game about a group of friends who go camping in the middle of woods.

name: The Island: Escape Room
description: You wake up on an unknown island, alone and without help. Will you be able to solve the mysteries it contains? Will you find out how you got there? Could you escape from The Island?

name: The Legends of Maui
description: Defy gods and trick great spirits as you travel Aotearoa as the trickster Maui, in a time of magic. Based on the legends of Maui as well as several other myths and folklore from New Zealand.

name: The Lightless World
description: The Lightless World is a PC reverse horror action RPG co-op game set in a cosmic horror universe where players control demonic god protagonists.

name: The Meridian Gate
description: Use advanced sword fighting mechanics to break the posture of your enemies, unlock hidden techniques and acquire powers from a mysterious entity to help uncover the secrets of the eternal lighthouse.

name: The Midnight Walkers
description: Midnight Walkers is a horror PVPVE FPS game set in an intense indoor environment in an isolated building. Instead of limiting the battlefield horizontally, experience the unique suspense and fun that sets you apart from other games of the same genre by limiting the level of the building.

name: The Mines of White Label
description: If you want a good outcome, you need a good income. One of the largest companies in the kingdom has fallen into liquidation. Use your trusty hammer and the gap in the market to fight your way to the top.

name: The Mosquito Gang
description: Do you want to drink blood and buzz forever? Or to swat an annoying insect with one left hand? Dive into the eternal confrontation between human and mosquito in The Mosquito Gang!

name: The Multiverse Trilogy
description: Introducing The Multiverse Trilogy. The prequel to Alternate Universe

name: The Ord Accord
description: Plunge into a puzzling exploration of an unfortunate and tragic situation. Dodge vicious chickens and tough bosses, and suffer a cornucopia of painful losses, as you venture deep inside in a castle where the mad reside.

name: The Resonant
description: The Resonant is a Roguelite game w/ Magic, Dark Fantasy, FPS, Dungeon crawler, and Parkour (Wall Run/Dash) gameplay. Unlock over 100+ spells from 10 different elements to create your own custom magic spell slinging mage known as a Reaper. Play as single player or 2-6 player Co-op.

name: The Silent Forests
description: Embark on a captivating journey through the Silent Forests, treacherous sewers, and a mysterious house. Solve puzzles, face monsters, and unravel hidden truths in this adrenaline-packed adventure with a wacky narrator! 🚪✨

name: The State of Nowhere
description: Assigned to station 65, your role as employee 100411 will be to serve and sell products to the people, exercising the controls the state deems necessary to keep the population in line

name: There's something wrong with...
description: Short first-person horror experience where you navigate through dark tunnels, hide from a monstrous entity, and uncover the biggest secret of your life.

name: The VIllage of Eri
description: The Village of Eri is a rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired, platformer. You'll explore the world, fight bosses, buy gear and upgrade your character along the way. You may even choose what to keep for your next run if you can afford it.All of this in order to restore the village.

name: The Walls
description: A story of escape filled with nightmares, trapped within a simulation universe that is reality itself. Markus, dragged into a deep psychological pit by the pain of losing his family, finds himself confronting his nightmares in this simulation universe.

name: The Warden's Paradise
description: Warden's Paradise is a live action interactive video game where players play the role of a prison warden caught in a conspiracy, interacting with five women with different styles and purposes. Through your choices, gradually uncover the truth of the event!

name: Thumbling
description: Thumbling is a game about exploring and solving labyrinthine puzzles in an immersive environment. The player is a castaway who must use his sense of reflection, his deduction and his skill to mark a path using colored gems, in order to escape from a mysterious island.

name: T.K. Punk: G.O.L.D
description: Cyber Three Kingdoms Turn-Based Strategy RPG— As the latest humanoid AI developed, you were kidnapped by Zhang Jiao and joined the resistance organization—GOLD. Develop yourself, accept commissions, research prosthetics, cultivate companions and pursue the love and destruction in your heart!

name: Titan Forge
description: Titanforge: In a distant and mysterious realm, colossal mechs emerge as both saviors and enigmas. These towering machines, their origins shrouded in myth, become the vessels for our survival. Forge alliances, craft your path, and seek the truth. The colossal mech awaits your command.

name: Tobby The Dog
description: Small and a bit clumsy but smart and friendly, Tobby wants to explore the city and ends up having adventures with friends.

name: UltiMahjong
description: Riichi Mahjong Roguelike. Race an ever-accelerating score counter. Take full advantage of upgrades and usable items to force hands you've only dreamed of over the table. Build the perfect closed hand or make calls with abandon. Take risks, or get lost in the dust.

name: Under Walls
description: Explore randomly generated levels, collect treasures, and evade monsters. Play solo or with up to 6 players online. Customize your space between matches.

name: Unyverse
description: Unyverse is a sci-fi, action role-playing game (ARPG) created by Afrime Studios. Unyverse delivers an immersive, story-driven gameplay experience for single and co-op players enriched by a deep Afro-Futuristic aesthetic.

name: Virtual Darling: VR
description: Experience love without limits in Virtual Darling - VR! Select your ideal companion, evolve together through fantastical worlds, share intimate moments, and embark on romantic adventures. This is more than a game; it's a revolutionary journey into the future of relationships.

name: Vollema
description: Vollema is a hand-drawn 2.5D adventure where you, a college volleyball player, tackle your problems the best way you know how... through volleyball!

name: Weapon Mix
description: Buy weapons, flee from enemies and survive as long as possible. Improve your weapons to last longer

name: Wave Weaver
description: Wave Weaver is a high action water combat VR game. Face off against your opponent by creating and manipulating water to become a hurricane on the battlefield. Utilizing the abilities at your disposal, create a fluid arsenal to wreak havoc towards any person who stands in your way!

name: Wizard Mukbang: The Game
description: Experience Wizard Mukbang like never before! You are the Mukbang Wizard, a famous food wizard. Battle cursed food and grab loot in this classic turn-based RPG as you level up and grow stronger. Gather party members and determine the fate of the Kingdom. Strange mysteries need to be solved...

name: WhyImmortal
description: What is Immortal is a multiplayer sandbox game with Chinese Immortal Cultivation culture. Players take on the role of a cultivator, exploring, cultivating, refining and other events, during which they will realize the true meaning of "seeking immortality", "the great way" and "longevity".

name: Sword Fight
description: "Sword Fight" is a card battle game based on the martial arts world. Players can play as a mysterious knight in the arena and team up with other players for 3v3 confrontation.

name: Pimp My Dice
description: Pimp My Dice is a Yahtzee Roguelike experience. Score enough to make it to the next level, customize your dice to score more and collect relics to create unlimited combos! Collect money through the rounds to buy new dice, relics, and customizers to upgrade your dice. Enjoy a new run every time!

name: Go! Save The Queen!
description: The ants have lost their queen; help them find a new one! Armed with toys, explosives, and other items, think fast, draw lines to command your ants, and protect your queen from the hordes of enemy insects looking to put an early end to their rule in this funny but brutal escort tower defense game.

name: Sol Apocalypse
description: KNOW YOUR ENEMY. FIRE YOUR CANNONS. A spaceship management and combat game. As the Captain of Silver Wolf, command your crew and use your energy strategically. Change your future with your decisions. Arm your ship and strengthen its shields. Survive in the solar system full of dangers.

name: They Speak To Us
description: They Speak To Us is a 1-4 person co-op horror game. Voice record your own monsters, and capture them before the time runs out. Utilize a gravity gun flash light to both help or hinder your friends and monsters alike.

name: Drench
description: Inspired by my favourite games from the 90s and 2000s: DRENCH is an indie multiplayer/single-player sandbox experience where players can explore, colonize, or battle across an open galaxy!

name: That One Dungeon
description: That One Dungeon is a fast-paced dungeon crawler filled with never-ending levels, monsters, and traps! Choose your class and shoot them down to obtain your best score yet! Navigate through a labyrinth-style dungeon while trying to find hidden secrets and evade your inner fears!

name: Kaidro: Clan Battles
description: Kaidro: Clan Battles is near-isometric multiplayer ARPG, that expands on top of the hit comic series Kaidro: The Awakening. Choose a clan, engage in competitive multiplayer battles, and beware of rivals and sinister forces from the Void. Alpha release imminent!

name: Noiseless
description: Noiseless is a first-person survival horror game. You follow the story of a freelance investigative journalist who tries to uncover the secrets of the Gaudium Hospital.

name: Bakkal Simulator
description: Market Owner provides simulation of traditional small market, grocery businesses in Turkey. In addition to simulation elements, it features story structures in the Role Playing and Choices Matter genres.

name: Echoes of the Sun
description: This moving puzzle adventure story is about a little girl who witnessed the tragic fall of her homeland and the Sun explosion. The last one standing, she has a burden to restore light to the land and peace in her heart. Will she handle it?

name: Bespoken
description: Bespoken is a Co-op Roguelike, survival, wave defense game where you delve into monster filled dungeons, escape with treasures, get resources, build your own fort and protect it against the monster hordes at night.

name: Mercs Inc
description: 'Mercs Inc': A dynamic blend of tower defense, RTS, and RPG in a fast-paced, top-down strategy game. Engage in thrilling, small-scale combat for an action-packed adventure!

name: Snow White Ashes
description: Lose your heart in this dark fairy-tale romance! Once upon a winter night, you enter the woods in search of a beast. But the hunter you find is so charming and sweet–is he truly the monster you seek?

name: City Super Battlefield
description: Control characters to use weapons to engage in battles in the city, challenging more challenging battles

name: Interlude
description: Explore a virtual dungeon where each room is an entire game world, each with its own characters, gameplay, and themes. Dive deeper and deeper, unlock more and more worlds, and be the first to reach the Core!

name: Pippin Atmark Demonstration Disk
description: Sin descripción

name: Franklin the Turtle Learns Math
description: Sin descripción

name: Seclusion
description: The walls listens...

name: Autonomous Anarchy
description: A retro twin-stick bullet-hell where you fight hordes of enemies, collect powerful weapons and upgrades, and go head to head with menacing mechanical bosses. Take on the hordes solo or with a friend in local co-op!

name: Spliti
description: Play as a scientist who is the victim of a failed experiment. Free his soul trapped inside an energy cube in this puzzle platformer. Experience the adventure in local co-op with the scientist's young granddaughter.

name: FunFitLand
description: Step into FunFitLand, where dance grooves and combat moves blend in a fresh and innovative fitness experience!

name: Lunar Loot
description: Plow through swarms of aliens! Lunar Loot is a casual incremental game with hints of survivor-like gameplay. Kill aliens, acquire Moonshards, spend those Moonshards, and repeat. It's simple! No death! No stress! Just get rich killing aliens!

name: Undeliverable
description: Arcade style fast paced driving and delivery game where you drop off packages, mail, food, or people at their destinations.

name: This Is No Cave
description: This is no Cave! You better run, jump and swing! You're the unluckiest astronaut that has ever been sent to space. You've been captured and thrown into this fast paced 2D platform runner. Try to escape the caves and join back your ship, hopefully the worms won't catch you!

name: Rubbings
description: Rubbings is a Chinese folklore horror puzzle game. Four unbelievable topiaries follow each other like shadows, and four creepy stories come to mind in the middle of the night.

name: Head Over Heels
description: A dullahan goes to a speed-dating event: Will she fall head over heels or trip up on her chances for love?

name: Dungeon Battles
description: Manage the shared inventory of your party of adventurers and send them out to fight against other players in this roguelike auto-battler. Reforge and combine your items to change their shape and exploit the grid bonuses to the fullest.

name: Astral Arena
description: Create & Combat mystical creatures known as Astrals in this Monster Tamer Roguelike with unique Real Time Combat!

name: All You Can Take
description: Ever dreamed of becoming rich overnight, but don't fancy doing all that pesky hard work? You have one night to loot as much as you can from a house - just don't wake the owner! A 1-4 player physic-based stealth-robbery game.

name: Crypt Crawler
description: Descend 16 monster-filled levels to close the gate to the Underworld in this top-down tower defense dungeon crawler. Gather resources, discover blueprints, and build defensive towers to slice, dice, zap, and explode undead hordes. Play solo or 2-4 player local co-op.

name: Statecraft: Corrupted Democracy
description: Statecraft is a game that adds humor to political party management. In the atmosphere of the 70s and 80s, shape your country, defeat your opponents, come to power. Fight, stage a coup, make allies. Statecraft invites you to the exciting and corrupt world of politics.

name: Repterra
description: Repterra is a base-building survival game set in a world overrun by dinosaurs. Fend off massive hordes while building your colony. Manage resources and grow your army to survive in this dino-infested land.

name: Caleuche
description: You are on a fishing boat, capturing your last game for the night. As you hear a distant noise, you watch as a ship is rushing at your small vessel. This ship will test, attack and call you to action; your decisions have consequences, make them wisely.

name: MedCom Origin
description: MedCom Origin is a story about russian city in which the pathogen outbreak occurred. PMCs shoot people right on the streets of the city, parks and squares are turned into warehouses for corpses Welcome to the city, welcome to the hell.

name: DriftCE: Toyota Supra MK4
description: The Toyota Supra MK4 is the first DLC released in DRIFTCE - bringing into the game one of the most iconic and remarkable drifting cars ever created by Toyota. Now it's time to show off the world what you're made of - see you on the track!

name: Let's Patiti!
description: "Let's Patiti!" is a multiplayer party game that supports 2-4 players and can be played online or locally. In the game, you take on the role of an adorable little cat, engaging in a game of chase and cunning competition with your "Meow Meow" friends or AI in the "Meow Meow Forest".

name: Eldritch Climb
description:
Get to the heart of a mysterious mountain by swinging and climbing in this Roguelike Platformer. Gain eyes through your journey to reveal the horrifying and challenging altered versions of levels. Keep on trying with the aid of crazy items that both help you navigate and fight your way to the top.

There are Lovecraftian Horrors waiting to be unveiled... Will you chose to keep your sanity or will you accept the Mountain's lure...

Can you hear the calling?

name: Halo 3: Combat Evolved
description:
Halo 3: Combat Evolved is a mod for Halo 3: ODST that re-creates the Halo: Combat Evolved Multiplayer and Campaign experiences within Halo 3: ODST.

The goal of this project is to remake every single Campaign and Multiplayer level from Halo: Combat Evolved.

name: Oni 2
description: An unreleased sequel to Oni which would have been developed by Angel Studios and would’ve improved upon the combat system.

name: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects 2
description: An unreleased sequel to Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects which got cancelled due to the eventual closing of EA and Marvel's partnership in 2008.

name: The Box
description: The Box began as a Silent Hill proposal, however it is unclear if Konami were ever presented the project, as Silicon Knights soon partnered with SEGA to produce the game. The Box was supposed to be an “open world third person survival horror experience” for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. [source:silenthillmemories]

name: Catacombs
description: Catacombs was a team shooter RPG, planned to develop by Cavia after NieR with Square Enix publishing.

name: Estab Life: Unity Memories
description:
Estab Life: Unity Memories is a multiplayer action role-playing video game developed and published by Square Enix that was announced in 2022 as part of a multimedia promotion of the Estab Life manga.

As of March 2024, this game has not been released yet.

name: Lightclusters
description: Step into the world of Lightclusters - a 3D, ARPG set amongst the stars. Start off as Citrine, a young Star, suddenly forced to battle against her own kind when internal conflicts erupt. Take on unique and challenging bosses in your journey to defeat Tenebris, the leader of the Corrupted Stars.

name: Spellfolio
description: Create the best set of magic scrolls to defeat waves of enemies.

name: Village Farm
description: Welcome to "Village Farm," where the art of farming meets the thrill of strategic gaming!

name: Magical Angel Fairy Flower
description: This game is suitable for ages 12 and up. Contains suggestive scenes and some violent content.

name: Sex Feets
description: Sex Feets is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Nyamon Tamer: Retro Edition
description: Nyamon Tamer - Retro Edition is a return to classic monster-taming genre. Tame Nyamon and explore a vast world filled with thrilling turn-based battles and a mysterious legend to uncover. Tamer challenge... Accepted!

name: That Cowgirl Life
description: A cowgirl game that is suitable for children and is based in low-poly environments and is primarily built for VR. This game will receive support and substantial updates that will add to the story as well as adding functionality over the next six years as we explore the beauty and limits of VR.

name: VanillaBeast: Mystery Kink
description: Vanilla and the gang take on a sexy and hilarious story in this "throwback" comedy-horror adventure game spanning across several iconic parody levels including Camp Crystal Fake, BoDangles Chicken & Hoetel, and Strips Ahoy! Gentlemen's Club. Can you solve the mystery of the Legendary Phallus Stones?

name: FireWorks Inc.
description: FireWorks Inc. is a serious and fast-paced firefighting game, that combines fun and irony. The world has reached the point of no return due to climate change, and fire stations had to privatize. You are working to afford rent – deciding yourself which lives are worth saving.

name: Race Against a Duck: Duck Deluxe
description: "Water... Land... Sky... Do you have what it takes to defeat nature's All Terrain Vehicle?" Upgraded with new modes, improvements, and story content from the original web version!

name: Ninja Prophecy
description: Sin descripción

name: Generator Rex: Pack Fighter
description:
Rex will try to stop the evil in the face of Van Kleiss again, and do not let him first take the city and then the whole world.
But first Rex is to defeat all the E.V.O.s, save its friends and fight with assistants of Van Kleiss

name: Capoo Pals for MAC Expansion Set
description: Completely stress-free desktop games, heal your boredom at work and school Let the cute and funny Capoo accompany you every moment of using the computer

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Battle of the Bulge
description: Sin descripción

name: Sands of Hope
description: Explore this AI-Apocalyptic world, as you wander through the sands and help the last survivors with your magnetic abilities and your canine companion.

name: Ortheo Voyage
description: Ortheo Voyage is a 3D platformer featuring fluid movement, detailed levels, and a dynamic backtrack mechanic that creates thrilling precision challenges. Traverse stunning, stylized environments while racing against time to retrieve gears at each level's end.

name: Frog King
description: Dive into Frog King, where survival is key and every leap counts! Face several relentless bosses and ascend to the throne in a world brimming with danger. Miss a jump and plummet into peril; conquer the odds and claim your crown. Will you hop to victory or fall to the depths in your quest to the top

name: Ghost Ninja
description: Ghost Ninja is an action-packed game that puts players in the shoes of a skilled assassin.

name: Don't! Fret
description: Don't! Fret is stylized first-person psychological mascot-horror game set in a musically themed world. Play as a guitar named Fret to solve puzzles, escape from foes, and uncover the mystery behind Harmonic Heights.

name: Cozy Crest
description: Cozy Crest is a cozy open world adventure game for 1-4 players. Master the elemental powers; Water, Earth, Fire, Air and explore a vast world abundant with magic. Make new friends and find love. Cultivate your farm, build up your land and shape a community that evolves with every action!

name: Bumbi
description: A raging cute precision platformer with unique mechanics and levels to challenge your skills.

name: ExAltered
description: Unofficial card simulator for Altered TCG

name: Bob The Astronaut
description: Meet Bob, the inept astronaut with a heart of gold and a brain of space dust.Stranded on a random planet, Bob must rely on his laser-grapple guns to leave this planet. Can Bob bumble his way back home, or will he make intergalactic history for all the wrong reasons?

name: Circle
description: Circle is a tower defense game with a light card system, where you will play as a commander defending the Earth: by building/upgrading weapons on a rotating device called "Circle" and using cards to deal with the continuously invading aliens.

name: Catch Me If You Can
description: Catch Me If You Can is a multiplayer hide & seek game that immerses you into the world of Slavic mythology. Pick the role and play as one of the heroes, each having unique abilities.

name: Beyond The Board
description: A single player puzzle game that transforms traditional chess into a minimal immersive journey.

name: Annihilation
description: Doomed and surrounded, but not yet dead! Take on the role of Annihilator and purge the endless horde in this arcade survival shooter. Featuring roguelike elements and minimal resources: manage your loadouts between waves and strategically invest in war supplies to face the unknown threat.

name: Psychic Eclipse Code: Green
description: A sequel to the first Psychic Eclipse game.

name: Dungeon Munchies: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Blade Assault: Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! Love for These Clothes of Desire! - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombies vs. You
description: Step into a world overrun by the undead in this thrilling survival game.

name: Zero Days Since
description: A co-op survival horror game where you work as a warehouse associate for the world's fastest growing logistics company. Pick orders and stage them for shipment, but watch your back while you work, you can't shake the feeling that something (or things) is watching you.

name: ZDSS: Zombie Drone Survival Show
description: Welcome to the show! Immerse yourself in this thrilling survival rogue-lite. How long can you endure the relentless challenge? Elevate your experience by upgrading combat drones and fortifying the arena with an array of cunning traps.

name: The Leviathan's Fantasy: DLC
description: The Lost Immortal Sect— Lingyun Sect, as a pure stream in the world of cultivation, has always taken it upon itself to protect the mortal world.

name: My Liege
description: In this medieval strategy game, you are the lord of a small noble house, sworn to your liege lord, and tasked with managing the affairs of your house and people. The choices you make today will shape the relationships your house forms and will have last impacts for years and generations to come.

name: TerraStorm
description: TerraStorm, a survival city builder set after World War Two. In our timeline the outcome of the war… Will surprise you.

name: Geomoth Boot Sequence
description: Be THE Geomoth in the new nonlinear indie pixel art platformer metroidvania made by DROQEN, GABE, and PANCELOR in 2023-2024. Jump, Dive, Float, and Fly through over 100 interconnected chambers and unlock over 30 unique powers.

name: Rebuild the Wall
description: Rise up with 1–4 players in chaotic couch co-op to restore a fallen nation!

name: Infinity Knights: Xross
description: A King and his Infinity Knights wield The Armaments - weapons capable of reviving slain enemies. Xross, the newest Infinity Knight, will embark on a life-changing adventure as he experiences both the thrill and dark reality of what it means to be eternal.

name: Panik
description: Panik is a puzzle game where you must guide the different characters to the goal. But remember: Don't panik!

name: Hexaflip
description: Dive into a world of retro-futuristic aesthetics and high-voltage gameplay in this innovative turn-based strategy game. Every turn unfolds with intriguing possibilities as players combine moves, creating unique and complex strategies on the electrifying hexagonal battlefield.

name: Ramshackle.Exe
description: RAMSHACKLE.EXE is a 3D platformer about a broken repair robot trying to save his mechanical home from a destructive VIRUS. Find and repair viruses to fix the world. Just be careful, your efforts will restore ALL functions, both critical and dangerous.

name: Nyxia Survivors
description: Protect the world of Nyxia against hordes of monsters and demonic creatures coming from hell. In this Action-Roguelite dynamic game, play multiple heroes, find powerful equipment, spells and talents to defeat mighty enemies and rank among the best.

name: Clash Of Empires
description: "Clash of Empires" is a real-time strategy game where you start from scratch and build your empire into a superpower. Make strategic decisions to overcome other empires. Manage your resources, grow your economy, and expand your country.

name: Bombing
description: Play the role of aliens, invade Earth, plunder resources, and eliminate survivors.

name: Palm Paradise Garden
description: Cultivate and nurture your very own world of verdant exotic plant life in this tropical greenhouse gardening game.

name: Cold Lazarus
description: Embark on a thrilling odyssey with Lazarus amidst Nimbranumbra's asteroid islands. Encounter charismatic characters, explore ancient ruins, quaint villages, and brave the eerie 'Frameworks.' Battle foes, complete quests, and solve puzzles in this captivating hand-drawn fantasy epic!

name: Cat Simulator: Kitty Conundrums
description: Cat Simulator: Kitty Conundrums invites you to dive into the world of feline cunning! Playing as a crafty cat, your mission is to outsmart the unsuspecting neighbor below. Descend the stairs, unleash chaos – spoil food, drown phones, even detonate the microwave.

name: Quell the Disaster
description: This is a 2D pixel horizontal board through the game, through the mouse and keyboard operation. Gain money by destroying monsters and strengthen your abilities; You can acquire additional weapons for special attacks. Players use maneuvers and their favorite extras to help them through the level.

name: Echovale
description: Collect, upgrade, and relax! As you gain more and more cards, you'll be able to upgrade any duplicates you have. Any cards you earn are yours forever! And in your downtime, why not make friends with all the townspeople?

name: Dispatch Madness
description: Manage the flow of a fresh produce warehouse ! Place orders with suppliers, handle incoming pallets, and dispatch them from the loading bay to your customers. Stay cool under pressure ! Deal with the increasing pressure and unexpected events.

name: Meow Meow Wizard Arena
description: Train your cats in the magical arts to make them strong and powerful! Craft ridiculous costumes and clothe your cats in the finest linen to make them beautiful! Breed your cats with other powerful cats to create even more powerful offspring! Battle other cats in online multiplayer for validation!

name: Rei Galo TD
description: Protect your kingdom in a game that combines Tower Defense and Action RPG. Build your perfect defense with towers, skills, hero, upgrades, and research to face 200+ different enemies. Evolve your hero, unlock new abilities, and expand your inventory to prepare for the greatest challenges!

name: The Hell: City Builder of the Dead
description: Welcome to the city-building game set in the depths of Hell. Assume the role of the Hell Governor and embrace the challenge of welcoming souls who perished in major, historically accurate human catastrophes. Are you ready to build and govern your own infernal city?

name: Nirvana
description: Nirvana is a "Multi Action Loglike" game that compares the characteristics of the loglike genre to the doctrine of Tibetan Buddhism's reincarnation. Go on an adventure to protect the world by becoming twins Padma and Pema, who shared the power of God that should lead to one for generations!

name: Ordinary Stickman Goes For A Walk
description: Ordinary Stickman Goes For A Walk is a 2D platformer with lots of different mechanics and a little bit of humor down the road.

name: Capoo Pals for MAC
description: Completely stress-free desktop games, heal your boredom at work and school Let the cute and funny Capoo accompany you every moment of using the computer

name: Pingdom
description: Pingdom is a Tower Defence game with endless replayability with the random terrain generation and wave system.

name: EndlessChoice
description: EndlessChoice is a deck-building game that uses dice and cards. players can choose different professions, weapons, and cards, along with various unique items to build their own deck. Players can also invite friends to cooperate in defeating enemies, with a maximum of three people playing together.

name: Forged In Dungeon
description: 'Forged In Dungeon' is a thrilling top-down action shooter, blend futuristic weapons and martial arts together to take down enemies in stylish and violence ways.

name: Solar Quiz VR
description: The educational app Solar Quiz VR will introduce you to the planets of our Solar system in virtual reality mode in the format of an entertaining quiz.

name: Backrooms: Beyond One Year
description: One year after the existence of backrooms was announced, a large number of enterprises, groups, and individuals wanderers are rushing into this world. Danger, terror, and even death could not stop humanity's desire for benefits!You are a wanderer who is going tomake some money with them....

name: Maga Patalójika
description: Sin descripción

name: Asteróide
description: Sin descripción

name: A Escalada do Pateta
description: Sin descripción

name: TimeBomb90second
description: Sin descripción

name: Lightdancer
description: Embark on a mystical journey through the enchanted forest as a Lightdancer, an elite archer bound by oath to restore the balance of light and shadow. Wield your Soliflare arrow, a unique weapon infused with the power of both sun and moon, capable of setting ablaze both matter and malevolent spirits.

name: Vanguard Monsters
description: Vanguard Monsters is a Roguelite Autobattler where you raise a party of monsters, collect treasure, and do battle to fend off the invading forces of the Void. Battles happen automatically, with anywhere between 1 to 6 monsters on either side of the field. Each monster attacks or uses their ability when their respect charge meters fill, so you will need to choose the best formation at the start of the battle to tackle what unique challenges the enemies present each time. You move a monster in battle but theres a cooldown on this, so time it wisely to protect someone weak or concentrate damage on a big threat! When a monster reaches 0 hp it will be unable to fight for the rest of that battle and your party will accrue a wound. Gain too many wounds and your monsters will be unable to continue their quest.

name: Betrayed
description: Enter Betrayed, a 3-16 player party shooter where trust is scarce, and deception is paramount. Navigate diverse maps, use proximity voice chat to strategize, and earn currency for traitorous tools. Will you prove innocence or master deception? Gather your friends for suspense and laughter!

name: Aqua Mundo
description: Inspired by classic theme park games, Aqua Mundo allows you to build the waterpark of your dreams! Design pools, lazy rivers, and water slides while sculpting an immersive thematic world. Keep guests entertained and maintain your infrastructure to keep the park afloat financially.

name: Night Shift at Fazclaire's Nightclub
description:
Night Shift at Fazclaire's Nightclub is a 3D freeroam FNAF parody NSFW game and does contain nudity, sex and suggestive themes. Your aims are :

1. Complete all the tasks you will get during the night, such as entering rooms or finding lost items.
2. Keep up the energy in 3 generators located in the nightclub.
3. Watch your sanity and energy.
4. D̶o̶n̶'̶t̶ get caught by animatronics/h̶a̶l̶l̶u̶c̶i̶n̶a̶t̶i̶o̶n̶s̶.

name: Vindictus: Defying Fate
description:
is a new high-speed fantasy action-RPG inspired by Celtic mythology.
Jump into the fast-paced medieval fantasy adventure that combines exciting combat.
Enjoy various distinct characters with unique abilities and combos to face fearsome creatures.

name: Crystal Realms
description: Crystal Realms is a sandbox platforming mmo game where you can build worlds, fight enemies, and socialize with friends.

name: Pinball Blitz
description: Pinball Blitz combines arcade pinball with a fast-paced action roguelike. Shape each run with selectable themes, flipper setups, and table upgrades to defeat bosses and achieve high-scores.

name: Hungry Hungry Mario
description: A flash game where you collect all the dots on the screen. Some levels even offer special dots that can allow double jumping.

name: Nerdle
description: Nerdle challenges you to find the hidden calculation in just six guesses. In the wider nerdleverse, you'll roam an entire galaxy of puzzles, including number-based crosswords, anagrams, and so much more. Whether you're a math enthusiast or just looking for a daily brain workout, the nerdleverse has something special for you. Join us and let your mind explore the wonders of the nerdleverse!

name: Project Hornet
description: With a procedurally-assisted open world full of dynamic events, secrets, and encounters with multiple factions and entities, the game will offer you an immersive simulation combined with the best experience of survival games.

name: AM
description: Music blares to fend off the silence, and the only thing between you and slamming into the guardrail is a lukewarm gas station coffee. Nights like these, it's important to remember... What makes you so sure that you're alone?

name: Material Sniper
description: Japanese Flash game where you control a sniper girl as you complete missions. The game simulates bullet physics such as velocity and wind effect.

name: The Tragic Loss of M. Slazak
description: Miroslav Slazak - a Polish immigrant who fled to Britain shortly before the outbreak of the Second World War. His only possessions were the clothes on his back, his passport and a large antique ship’s chest. It was chained shut.

name: Brink Game
description: A Brick Game variant released in Brazil by Art Brink.

name: Diet of Dinos
description: Diet of Dinos, a prehistoric turn-based rogue-lite, you embody a carnivorous dino on a quest across a mysterious island to feed your captive ruler.

name: Mass Effect: Team Assault
description: An unreleased spinoff to the Mass Effect series which got scrapped after 4 months of being in development. Some of it’s aspects would later be implemented into Mass Effect 3.

name: The Fast And The Furriest
description: An unreleased racing game featuring Rare characters.

name: Dancing Game
description: A Dance Dance Revolution-inspired game released in Brick Games.

name: GunRoad
description: Sin descripción

name: Magica Memoria
description: A cooperative quiz RPG? Why, that is actually correct!!

name: LightBear: Grizzelda Returns
description: LightBear is a randomly generated action RPG whackathon with heavy Rogue-like elements. Players will lose their vision the further from the starting point they get. Don't be deceived by its appearance, this game will challenge you to no end. Watch out for 100's of randomized monsters.

name: ROM: Remember of Majesty
description: Embark on an epic journey through a captivating realm teeming with marvels and trials in ROM: Remember of Majesty, an immersive MMORPG brought to you by Kakao Games. Elevate your gaming adventure by unlocking exclusive benefits through redeem codes. This article is your go-to resource for a detailed breakdown of free coupon codes for ROM, guiding you through the process of redemption to amplify your overall gaming experience. Explore the magical world of ROM and seize these opportunities for enhanced gameplay!

name: Drowned Memories
description: Drowned Memories is an upcoming narrative-driven game taking place in the late 1950s, when the federal capital of Brazil, Brasília, was being built. Based on real events, the game tells the story of one of the largest workers' villages called Amaury Village, which was flooded by the waters of the artificial lake Paranoá.

name: Clockwork Ambrosia
description: Clockwork Ambrosia is a compelling steampunk fusion of metroidvania and a 2D shooter. Players pull on the boots of an airship pilot to combat an army of deadly robots and monsters. Experiment with a range of rule-breaking weapons modifications and armors to prevail through this wild adventure!

name: Moonflower: Fae's Rest Epilogue
description: The Moonflower is saved, but the love story burns bright. Continue the love story of Skylar and Ender in this epilogue after story.

name: Flawless Dream
description: A young man doomed to insomnia finally closes his eyes, but when he opens them again he finds himself in an astral world. The demon standing in front of him bargins to solve his sleep problem by sharing good memories. The devil is starving for mana crystals and he asks this young man to help him.

name: Search of Magic Ore
description: Search of Magic Ore is a mixture of RPG and Rogue-like game, you find yourself in a vast location where your main goal is to complete the task and move further along the level. Go to the magical forest, eliminate as many enemies as possible and bring back magical ore!

name: Demonic Astal
description: Demonic Astal is a 2D platformer where you as a brave demon hunter, go to the demonic world to find a magical portal. You must go down the floors in search of a portal, overcoming various obstacles and fighting dangerous creatures to become stronger.

name: Wuilsafe
description: Wuilsafe is adventure game about exploration. Expand your world, explore a bunch of interesting mechanics. Play comfortably. Play the way you like. Play with blocks.

name: Punk
description: Punk is an action roguelike set in a mysterious open world with bullet hell combat and big emphasis on exploration. Fight your way through varied biomes, interact with diverse ecosystems and collect modules that you can use to customize your ship.

name: Hours After Midnight
description: Dive deep into a roguelike survival quest against Rettam'diov, the Consumer of Worlds. Progress, earn experience, refine characters, and uncover potent tools. Face relentless hordes alone or amplify the thrill, teaming up cross-platform in our distinctive co-op mode.

name: Trepidation
description: A co-op horror about searching the depths of the ocean for treasure.

name: Project O.R.C.S.
description: Project O.R.C.S. is a multiplayer Collaborative Storytelling RPG where you work together with your party to create characters, craft quests, and tell stories. Building upon the magic of telling a story around a table with a group of friends, and evolving that experience into the online world. You can generate and start your session within minutes rather than hours. Whether you choose the role of Guide to facilitate the group’s journey or you join as an Adventurer and craft your dream character, you and your party collaborate to play a story only limited by your imagination.

name: Buckshot Roulette
description: An unofficial Web Browser port of the game.

name: Hentai: Maid Madness
description: Embark on a captivating journey surrounded by regal charm in this alluring jigsaw adventure! Immerse yourself in the world of Maids, where you'll encounter a variety of stunning girls sure to captivate your imagination!

name: Foot Odor Girl
description: The heroine is a girl who likes sports. However, what is troubling is that after exercise, the stockings on her feet will be wet by sweat, giving out a unique smell.

name: Foot Massage
description: The player plays the role of a foot masseuse. Every night to receive city beauties, provide foot massage services. Serve people and meet own little hobbies.

name: Love in the Crimson Void
description: Embark on an interstellar odyssey in Love in the Crimson Void. Navigate the treacherous nebula, forge connections and confront the unexpected. Immerse yourself in a captivating narrative, where love and the cosmos collide.

name: Echoes of Yi: Samsara
description: "Echoes of Yi : Samsara" is a hard-core martial arts action game that incorporates elements of traditional Chinese culture. In the game, players play a martial arts character who prevents disasters in the world and restores stability and peace to one side.

name: Graphomata
description:
Build abstract structures using 6 commands
Design algorithms and watch them getting coded automatically

name: AquaLife 3D
description:
Create your own fascinating and realistic underwater world on your mobile device!
AquaLife 3D - it's a real live aquarium that you can take with you wherever you go!
With AquaLife 3D you can create attractive saltwater, freshwater and even fantasy aquariums as well as choose their inhabitants and decorate them. You can buy, feed, grow and sell fish, earning coins, diamonds and experience. There are over 100 species of exotic fish, more than 100 decorations and items, a variety of backgrounds and aquatic pets. Your possibilities are endless!

name: Super Battle Polycars
description: Hop into the driver's seat in this modern old-school vehicle combat game! Fight for victory alongside your teammates in our Massive Online Vehicle Arena to put your driving skills to the test or spawn into Arena Deathmatch! DRIVE the fastest, DESTROY the competition, and DOMINATE.

name: Dragonkin: The Banished
description: In a world ravaged by dragons, play as four heroes, solo or multiplayer, and fight hordes of enemies, adapt your build with the unique Ancestral Grid system, improve your city, and share it with your friends.

name: MXGP: The Official Game
description:
Players will be able to explore behind the scenes of the world’s most iconic motocross championship, with access to all the discipline’s official content – with the game providing calendar, riders, teams, bikes and sponsors.

The start of a new MXGP game series developed by KT Racing and published by Nacon, who has the rights for the franchise from 2024 to 2028.

name: Dice Blaze
description:
Dice Blaze - 1v1 Turn-based Combat game

Immerse yourself in strategic battles, unleash powerful abilities, and master the art of the dice.

Dive into a world of strategy and chance, where epic battles, cunning tactics, and thrilling adventures await.

name: Mary's Arcade: Service Pack
description: Mary's Arcade: Service Pack is a complete visual and technical rework of Mary's Arcade

name: Soul Warden Professional Academy
description: Soul Warden Professional Academy is a simulation management and tactical strategy game. Here, you will rebuild a desolate combat academy, recruit and train professional soul wardens Lead them to break through their limits in various combat styles and reach the pinnacle.

name: Codename: Nanxiangzi
description: Codename: Nanxiangzi is a strategy playing game self-developed by SparkNexa Studio.

name: Mi Espada
description: This is a Survivor-like sandbox game inspired by the Three Kingdoms. Setting your build and upgrading weapons to drive off the tide of enemies. Your favorite generals are waiting for you to unlock. Let's jump to this impracticable Three Kingdoms and be an unstoppable general.

name: Death's Web
description: "Death's Web" is a challenging "Rogue-lite" platformer where you explore an ever-changing 2D world filled with enemies ready to slay you. Numerous curses are waiting to be discovered; they may lead to your demise, but perhaps they're valuable.

name: Archie's Ribs
description: Archie is a little dog on a big adventure. His favourite food is Ribs but he can't have them until they are cooked. Your mission is to pass the time by having fun, taking naps and finding his second favourite food, NugNugs. A game filled with mini games & adventures. Will you help him get his Ribs?

name: Money Maker
description: Embark on a journey to build the greatest empire ever known by simply clicking your mouse. Your goal is to amass as much wealth as possible, and you'll do so by starting small and gradually expanding your empire one click at a time.

name: CEO Fish
description: Community-centric, realistic fishkeeping simulator where you sell fish and grow your business with the community and friends!

name: Corrupted
description: Corrupted immerses players in a haunted mansion, providing a suspenseful exploration of its eerie past. Combining psychological and survival horror, the game offers a truly chilling experience with elements such as exploration, puzzle-solving, resource management, and combat.

name: MechDrachen
