description: Dive into non-stop action in a movement-based arena shooter, blending some of the most familiar gameplay elements of the genre into a completely new experience, build around the idea to have the most fun with your friends you could possibly have with a movement shooter.

name: Story of the Lost Dot
description: Experience the classic tale of Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland in a whole new way.

name: The Girl Under The Tree: Anna
description: Survival horror, exploration, puzzles, zombies, and mystery.

name: Dreadweave
description: Immerse yourself in a horror extraction shooter where you must escape a Soviet ghost town with a monster from an upside-down world tracking your heartbeat. Arm yourself, gather resources, and fight to survive. Death is just the beginning—it's your gateway to an inside-out reality.

name: Frisson
description: A single-player press start to play arcade game with an unlockable story, branching paths, achievements, and high-velocity audio-visual gameplay, set to an infinite-runner sci-fi vapor core.

name: Opaldune
description: A scifi third person survival horror. Stranded in the farthest reaches of space, Dr. Belica Gale boards the Opaldune seeking help. But in the bowels of the ship, monsters are prowling. Slip through dark hallways to scavenge for supplies, solve puzzles, and evade enemies long enough to get back out.

name: Dungeon Settlers
description: A colony sim based dungeon crawler where you manage your clan to build a settlement in barren land, provide food and shelter for your people, lead them deep into the merciless dungeon, overcome challenging combat by your strategy.

name: Bonanza Burger
description: Bonanza Burger: Build, manage, and compete! Design your restaurant, hire a top-notch team, and battle rival managers. Conquer challenges, expand, and prove you're the ultimate fast-food mogul!

name: Expedition Astra
description: Explore the uncharted territories of the Kuiper Belt in a deeply immersive virtual reality experience. Hone your skills in spacecraft docking, engage in strategic asteroid sampling, and unveil the secrets of this distant region of our solar system.

name: Headwaters
description: A short fishing game early in development :-). Collect fish population samples for WDOE as you rebuild a once great public transportation network with the help of your new REALLY REALLY cool bird friends. Also unlock a bunch of new areas, fishing rods and upgrades!

name: Path of the Djinn
description: Fight your way through the scorching desert of Samsara and stop the Djinn in this roguelike adventure! Save water, build your travel deck, and enhance your party skills through the game's unique skill perk system to prevail in turn-based combats!

name: Car Detailing Cleaner Simulator
description: Become the ultimate car detailing expert! Meet customers with dirty cars and transform their vehicles into sparkling clean havens. Are you ready to make every ride shine? Take on the role of a car cleaning guru! Dive into a realistic car salon cleaning simulation on Steam.

name: Photons
description: Photons is a co-op horror game for a group of players. In total environmental blindness, your goal is to explore diverse cave systems and maintain local machinery with the support of various tools. Be aware - you are not alone.

name: Quantum Void
description: Lost in an unexplored star system after a dimensional anomaly dispersed your fleet, you pick up signals scattered throughout the system. Explore the wrecks of your fleet vessels, collect useful modules for your ship, discover the secrets of the anomaly, and try to escape from this star of doom!

name: Terminus: Ultiverse
description: Terminus introduces a cast of AI-powered Non-Player Characters (NPCs) unlike any before. Each character possesses a fully integrated worldview, allowing for deeply meaningful interactions and conversations that branch into multiple paths, each influencing the game's progression and possible endings.

name: PalmRide: After Flight
description: Prepare to take flight in the retrofuturistic PalmRide universe. Explore neon cities, colorful mountains, beaches and more while shooting your way through a world full of enemies who want to kill you. Enjoy an on-rails shooter with retro outrun aesthetics!

name: Aletheia: Return of Odysseus
description: Embark on an accurate retelling of Homer’s Odyssey. A classic-inspired CRPG that puts you in control of Odysseus during his return home from the Trojan War. The game features turn-based combat, detailed character creation, choices and consequences, and a faithful depiction of Homer's Greece.

name: Alex Hill: Whispers at White Oak Inn
description: Ever since a young woman died near the White Oak Inn, strange things have been happening. Now, her spirit roams the inn, and an employee is receiving strange letters. What dark secrets wait to be found? The clock is ticking and you, as Alex Hill, must uncover the truth before it’s too late.

name: AkeriaTD
description: Classic tower defense game where you upgrade your towers. Get proficient in fighting specific mobs and make your heroes stronger.

name: AimRogue
description: AimRogue is the roguelike that tests your aim. Use your cursor to blast through waves of targets as you stack upgrades and create absurdly broken builds.

name: Accurate Shot
description: Become an ace archer! Stretch the bowstring, aim and shoot! Control the arrow and hit all the targets on your way! Many exciting levels of varying difficulty await you! Whether you can pass this test is up to you!

name: 9Cat Saga
description: 9Cat Saga is a sci-fi cross-platfrom action-adventure in space, following a band of 9Cats seeking to shoot, loot, craft and dodge roll their way trying to find the source of a mysterious space virus spreading across the 9Metaverse. Take everything into your own paws or take the help of your band!

name: Abyss Signal: Expedition
description: Since ancient times, there have been legends about an underwater civilization hidden from the eyes of people in the abyss of the Ocean. The stories would have remained legends until a strange artifact fell into the fishermen’s net, indicating that we are not the only intelligent beings.

name: 100 Pirate Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Pirate Cats.

name: My Adventure Book
description: Join the amazing adventure! Explore a magical world, solve puzzles, find objects and help local creatures. You will complete this game in 5 minutes!

name: Book-Warm
description: "Book-Warm" is a cartoony action-roguelite featuring fluid and various gun-combat. You can dive in to universes of famous books and rewrite their stories with our own choices. Fight the villians in the books and rewrite the story as you wish to make children books great again!

name: Rosetta
description: In this game, you can turn the foreign vocabulary you know (and that you didn't know until five minutes ago) into your power. Defeat the powerful enemies coming like a tide and survive tenaciously.

name: Lost in Translation: Silly
description:
Lacking memories and a purpose you take control of a recently awakened Resident inside Traumathos, the hereafter world. Your goal: fight your inner demons and face your past. Investigate the Sorrow's Polis, find your way through The Shyness Forest, and mostly important: unveil a mysterious language known as Murmure. Remember, you will die, true redemption requires sacrifice.

Lost in Translation: Silly is an investigation game with turn-based combat and bullet hell elements. Despite being an RPG at its core, the game has different mechanics depending on which plane of existence is being explored.

name: Feather Trail
description: Identify real-world bird species through timing-based minigames while exploring an open world of pixel habitats. Build your life list & compete with local birders. Conduct field research & master ornithology. Adventure off-trail into the backcountry. Build a cozy campsite to return to each evening!

name: Arcanum Fortuna
description: Arcanum Fortuna is a tarot-inspired roguelike deckbuilder set in a mystical world of wonders. Explore various enchanting regions, meet a compelling cast of characters and keep an eye on your fate during card battles with a unique karma mechanic.

name: Symbol of Sacrifice
description: After experiencing a devastating event, three young siblings find themselves at the center of a struggle between two civilizations that could spell disaster on a global scale. A sacrifice must be made — one that will reshape the entire story and events that unfold. Who will you choose to sacrifice?

name: The Whiteout
description: Sin descripción

name: Comet
description: A light-hearted puzzle adventure where you play as the exuberant Stella who confronts her fear of the dark to search for her brother.

name: Diora
description: Sin descripción

name: For Home
description: In "For Home", embark on an intimate RPG adventure through space and time designed exclusively for Playdate. As Satsuki, traverse star systems, gather resources on planets, and fight Sentinels in turn-based action combat. Caught between personal aspirations and distant connections, unravel Satsuki's heartfelt journey of loss, love, and self-discovery.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Light from Above
description: Light from Above is a canceled Christian MMORPG made by Scott Cawthon in 2006.

name: Phantom Core 2
description:
Phantom Core 2 is a lost game made by Scott Cawthon sometime in 2003.

The only information about this game existing is an archive link that shows Phantom Core 2 next to the original Phantom Core. The game was labeled as beta, and it is unknown if a full game was ever made or released.

name: Theurgic
description: In this immersive, text-based RPG, you navigate complex social structures as an islander in a culturally tense setting. Delve into the lore and explore themes of identity, allegiance, and moral ambiguity in a story brought to life by the illustrations of artist Ori-Guy James.

name: The Ultimate Couch Game
description: A simple funny couch game to play with up to 9 friends! Enjoy competing to reach the end of the board through winning minigames whilst sabotaging your friends to increase your odds! Best with friends!

name: ThirdPlace: Kon and Pon
description: A casual action game in which you control Pon, a raccoon dog, as he continues his journey up the mountain and beyond!You can change your character's appearance to make him more unique! Changechange" as often as you can to gain an advantage!

name: Through the Thorns and Curses
description: This is roguelike deckbuilding game inspired by tabletop games. Start your journey and challenge yourself - became a stranger, build yours decks to explore, fight and collect treasures. Try to make your way through the Thorns and Curses!

name: Throw Your Phone: Into The Ocean
description: As simple and as satisfying as it sounds, Throw your Phone! (Into the Ocean) A relaxing and meditative experience designed to calm your wild mind. With scored Arcade and open-ended Zen modes among multiple stunning & immersive environments.

name: Thus Spoke the Donke
description: Thus Spoke the Donke is an immersive stealth-action game that casts you as a mercenary assassin. Customize your weapons and abilities, equip them according to your play style. Find the way to complete your mission either stealthily or through pure action with the help of personalized gameplay.

name: Thorgard
description: Thorgard is a minimalistic viking base defense game. Defend your sacred meadhall against enemies.

name: Timebound
description: Dive into "Timebound," a thrilling multiplayer card game where history and future collide. Build your deck, battle across eras, and shape history. Strategy meets time travel in this epic quest through time.

name: Toadally Dreadful
description: Toadally Dreadful is a throwback 90’s mascot horror. Hop into action when you realize your fellow campers have gone missing! Lake Oakwood holds radical mysteries, bodacious puzzles, and tubular terrors! Let’s hope we can escape from the freaky frog frights or this campout will be TOADALLY DREADFUL!

name: Todomiro
description: Todomiro is a cozy adventure with a magical zooming ability. Change perspective from the cosmos in all of its glory to a tiny world hidden inside the drink of an ant. Explore your inner flâneur through this relaxing world full of charm, goofs, and of course, gags

name: Tiny Gnome Game
description: Tiny Gnome Game is a short, relaxing, fun experience combining many different inspirations into one game. Begin a journey to return home after falling from the sky.

name: Tiny Realms
description: Level up your tiny heroes with earned XP, unlocking an array of powerful abilities and upgrades. As you delve deeper into the realms, gather an assortment of loot, to increase youre strength and deafet challanging bosses.

name: Toto Zoo
description: Toto Zoo is a first-person thriller that provides a fun and frightening experience through its Microphone Detection, Stealth Mechanics, Intelligent Threats and Story Interactions.

name: Across the Wonderlands
description: A whimsical open world survival crafting game! Build your magical base dimension and craft fun dishes to fight quirky foes on your journey to the fallen star.

name: Toonsouls
description: Toonsouls is a Platform Game.

name: Tower of Whispers
description: The Tower of Whispers is a rogue-lite hack-and-slash dungeon crawler. Fight your way through the tower, with each floor more treacherous than the last, to harness its powers and unveil its secrets.

name: Trail of Singularity
description: In 2207, Earth vanished. As a Hyper Station engineer, explore abandoned spaceships, face android guardians, craft tools, and mend your ship to find the last station in a 3000-light-year radius. Survival is key in this post-cataclysmic space odyssey.

name: TractionSim
description: In TractionSim you will find:Accurate simulation of all aspects of train control: from the work of traffic lights to traction with the railsA variety of routes: from simple to complex, with different types of trains and weather conditions.Multiplayer for joint play with friends

name: Train Planet
description: Welcome to Train Planet, the ultimate locomotion simulation game that allows you to immerse yourself in the captivating world of trains! Get ready to experience the thrill of being a train operator as you embark on a journey across a vast and diverse virtual landscape.

name: Treasure Hunters
description: Treasure Hunters is an intense CO-OP treasure-hunting game set in mysterious dungeons filled with puzzles, platforms, and deadly creatures where your goal is to find and steal the most valuable treasures.

name: Traverse the Backrooms
description: Traverse the Backrooms" is an indie horror game that immerses players into a mysterious labyrinth. Explore corridors, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of this realm while avoiding lurking dangers. Will you escape or become lost in the depths of the Backrooms?

name: TreamLand
description: "TreamLand" brings a great adventure to life. Play as a hero on a mission to save the village and escape from the island.

name: Travels of a Merchant's
description: Travels of a Merchant's - a 2D adventure platformer game in a fantasy world where you take on the role of a merchant's assistant, completing a variety of tasks and adventures. Go on a tour through mysterious and dangerous lands, where exciting adventures await him, completing tasks from the merchant

name: Transmogrified!
description: Escape the elemental world of TRANSMOGRIFIED! Journey through bizarre realms of Wind, Water, Earth and Fire while seeking to solve the mystery of those who have been TRANSMOGRIFIED. Save those you meet along the way, and return yourself back to human form. BEWARE THE MUDMEN!

name: Turtle Riders
description: Choose your weapons and ride your giant turtle while hordes of enemies try to take you down. Gather orbs to upgrade and pick the right skills to survive the long road to the outpost!

name: Troleu
description: TROLEU is a wacky and chaotic first-person action game that puts you in the shoes of a trolleybus conductor. Keep things rolling smoothly by ensuring passengers' travel validity, but watch out for rule-breakers! From issuing tickets to enforcing rules with your fists, it's all part of the wild ride.

name: Trust The Backrooms
description: Explore The Backrooms and try to escape them in procedurally generated levels with different protagonists, each character having their own story, levels and endings.

name: Trivia Deal
description: A challenging trivia card game with a randomly dealt deck each run. Test your knowledge by answering multiple choice questions of varying difficulty, earn tokens and use abilities to maximise your chances of conquering the board.

name: Twilight Tails
description: Twilight Tails is a captivating game where you become a raccoon navigating a challenging forest. Fight for territory, survive changing seasons, and evolve in multiplayer adventures. Conquer the jungle, rule survival!

name: Two Sides
description: Two Sides is a unique sandbox where you explore the duality of choices. Play as a savior or a sinner, navigating through complex scenarios that challenge your morality. You create your own story.

name: UAV Operator
description: Try on the role of an elite UAV operator: control combat drones, carry out important missions, and feel the weight of responsibility. Realistic locations, modern technology, strategic operations and career growth.

name: Unparalleled: Zero
description: Smash into year 2313 as an unemployed Rock Giant who gets an opportunity from the nefarious mega monopoly. Will you sign the contract? Actions have consequences. Push foes into the abyss, combine the elements, and time your hits in this Platformer RPG with Turn-Based Combat and Physics.

name: Underdog
description: UNDERDOG is a puzzle game with a dark story set in a city of wolves.

name: Underwater world
description: This is an adventure game that requires testing your eyesight and skills.

name: Upon Dusk
description: Upon Dusk is a survival horror shooter, where you and your friends can team up to survive in an unforgiving world, you can also go at it alone in our singleplayer mode, but be warned that the risk is much higher.

name: Uptake
description: Start this adventure and discover all the secrets hidden in the jungle while you discover who you are. Overcome the puzzles along the way to achieve your goal: recover your memory and do what you couldn't do.

name: Untimely Hidden: Patara
description: Our Time Agent Jaxon has a new mission: his arch-nemesis has stirred things up again. Now he should follow her to the ancient city of Patara and find the modern-day objects scattered around the city that she left behind.

name: Untethered
description: Stranded in deep space, you must survive against all odds. Scavenge from wreckage, process resources, and build your own space station - a refuge in the most hostile of environments.

name: Vended
description: Even the most familiar halls seem foreign once you are left in them alone. The sounds, smells, lighting, all seem recognizable, but wrong... or maybe its something else? dive in, test your courage and learn the truth in this unique short single player experience.

name: Velithra
description: Join Aria and Omega-9 in Velithra, a thrilling sci-fi escape! Survive the Alien Robot Armageddon, battle Omegas, solve puzzles, and break free from the dominators' grip. Unleash your strategic prowess in this action-packed adventure to save humanity!

name: Veliri: Planet of Machines
description: In this Sci-Fi RPG, you are a synthetic intelligence controlling war machines on an unknown planet. Improve your equipment, engage in battles with other players or NPCs, obtain resources and earn ratings, trade, complete tasks and find allies.

name: Veil of the Skies
description: Embark on an emotionally charged journey through the ruins of a war-torn world in "Veil of the Skies"; a gripping narrative-driven adventure that explores the resilience of civilians amidst chaos and devastation.

name: V.E.D.A
description: V.E.D.A is a Soulslike training game with weighty combat and exploration. The protagonist, awakened with no memory, undergoes combat training in a training simulator and uncovers hidden secrets. You too can enter the Soulslike genre. Don't hesitate.

name: Vasya Run: Ghetto Gopnik
description: Explore, a courier and graffiti artist caught in an extraterrestrial invasion amidst a society ruled by surveillance. Can speed and infiltration skills be enough?

name: VariVa Revenge
description: Dodge or parry the bullets, and attack the enemy directly! This is a new type of game that adds 2D action elements to a bullet-hell game!

name: Van Helsing: The Lightmaker
description: Take on the role of the legendary monster hunter and brilliant inventor, professor Abraham Van Helsing, in a new telling of his story in this FPS action game, where he fights to save the steampunk land of Dawnlight, plagued by a sudden invasion of terrifying monsters.

name: Vignettes: The Dream City
description: Vignettes: The Dream City is a first-person surreal dream-crawler game featuring turn-based combat, knowledge-based gameplay, non-linear exploration, and souls-like progression. Your dreams are haunted by a strange city, and you feel supernaturally drawn to explore it. What will you find within?

name: Voiceless
description: Voiceless is a cooperative horror game that can be played alone or with up to 4 players. Your goal is to survive making as little noise as possible, because any sound, including your microphone, can be heard by the Maniac, who is eager to catch you and your friends.

name: Walks Of Life
description: This is a life sim board game where the board represents one year of your life. Through luck and strategy you must avoid landing on negative squares and strategize on how to optimize your four core life parameters - health, social life, career and wealth.

name: Waltz and Jam
description: Waltz is a pure and innocent soul who awoke in Downtown, and Jam is the lovable dog who was there waiting. Join them on this amazing and heartwarming journey.

name: Wandering Cat
description: Wandering Cat is a fantasy adventure game for all cat lovers. The game offers an immersive and fun experience, where players can take on the role of a brave and independent cat with a refined palate!

name: Wardens of Chaos
description: Wardens of Chaos, a real-time party-based RPG inspired by classics. Travel to diverse locations, visit interesting cities, master skills, and fight hordes of monsters. Uncover conspiracies as you strive to save the world from impending doom in this thrilling adventure.

name: Wagon Gloom
description: In 1961, a mysterious subway train disappears, in which operates a dark cult of souls of the sect all entered the cars, turning the train into a ghost, and again the train falls into the subway, an ordinary resident who fell asleep after a day of work, accidentally fell into another dimension

name: Weird mister Bogot
description: A computer game in the quest genre with a short plot and mysterious characters in the style of Russia in the early 90s.

name: Weeny Wise
description: Embark your adventure with your companion in Weeny Wise. Invite a friend to join you for free in the magical world of Weeny Wises with Friend’s Pass and continue the story of Anneli and Hugo.

name: Washed Upon A Murder
description: After washing onto a private island, you soon find yourself in the middle of a murder mystery puzzle. The worst part? Everyone thinks you've dunnit! Will you be able to prove Detective Sal's innocence? Find clues, spot contradictions and solve puzzles to discover the truth and find the real killer.

name: War Trigger
description: Destroy, smash and blast your way to victory! Use advanced weapons and vehicles to dominate the battlefield.

name: Wish Eater
description: Wish Eater is a horror game with touches of action where you explore a building in search of a girl who disappeared without a trace. Solve puzzles, search for clues and recreate her steps to discover the mystery of her disappearance. Depending on the investigation you will reach different endings.

name: Wild Assault
description: "Wild Assault" is a third-person PvP shooting game aiming to deliver a thrilling furry hero warfare experience. With intense combat atmosphere, exhilarating firearm shooting, and unique hero skills, furry heroes from around the world roam between battlefields, each seeking their own destiny.

name: Xavian
description: "Choose Xavian or Hathor, magical lions battling alien invaders in this action-packed adventure!"

name: Wreck
description: Wreck is a fast-paced shooter with a fully destructible environment. Demolish entire maps and create your own with the free level editor. Take down an oppressive regime in the singleplayer campaign, or fight against your friends in multiplayer.

name: WuKong Up
description: 《Wukong UP》 is a 3D parkour game featuring the Chinese mythological character "Wukong" as the main character. Sun Wukong caused a great disturbance in the Heavenly Palace and was later suppressed by the Tathagata under the Mountain. The player will control Wukong's Clone to rescue himself.

name: World Xplore
description: Envision the real world in VR

name: Wraith
description: Inspired by Doom and Severed Steel, Wraith’s various enemy types will force you to constantly reassess and adapt to the situation, discoverable perks will grant you eccentric advantages and the unique levels act as a theater for smooth and flashy gameplay.

name: Zephinala
description: In a 2D RPG adventure exploration game, a boy named Saba finds himself in an enchanted world filled with numerous anomalies and mythological creatures. Your goal is to explore this world and find a way back to the real world.

name: Zero Distance
description: Take on the role of a courageous freedom fighter and defeat waves of occupation forces in this bullet heaven. Buy weapons and upgrades between waves and become absurdly powerful against an invading army.

name: Zombie Army VR
description: Zombie Hitler may have been defeated, but the zombie hordes are still at large and Europe remains in the throes of war. Return to the field as part of the Deadhunters, an elite squad fighting to end the zombie apocalypse!

name: Zone 6
description: Zone 6 is a short choose-your-own-adventure game for 1-4 players. Experience the chaotic city of Zone 6 while raising your stats before venturing out into the perilous icy wasteland which has claimed the lands. Will you return?

name: Sayonara Jinsei.
description: Sin descripción

name: Xianzong Lu
description: "Xianzong Lu" is a fairy repair, sandbox, pigeon, business simulation role-playing game, players need to start from 0 to create your Zong door, experience the original Xiuxian novel Shuang Wen plot and the lively meat pigeon brush treasure battle.

name: Legend of the Otherworld
description: “Legend of the Otherworld” is a 2D Roguelike shooter. Unique for its weapon system, players combine components to create diverse shooting effects and skills. This design offers infinite possibilities, enriching the gaming experience. A must-play for all gamers.

name: Gensou: Yumegogochi
description: Sin descripción

name: Bahamut 2: Dragon's Bride
description: When Clear sealed Bahamut again, he grew up for the second time and still aspires to become an adventurer. What awaits him is a more magnificent adventure story, and everyone is welcome to experience it.

name: Evil Draws Close
description: We are very pleased to be able to bring our second work "Evil Draws Close" to meet you, "街" received a lot of players recognition and praise, which gives us a lot of encouragement to continue to create. Thank you again for the support and love of the street friends.

name: Jujinchan
description: New Experience! Anomaly Search x Novel Game!! Beware of demons lurking in the city, targeting the life of "Jujin-chan" every day! Escape from demons disguised as humans and survive until January 1st! The demons are attempting to drink Jujin-chan's blood to achieve immortality! Be careful!

name: Lost Girl
description: In the dark, the girl seems to have returned to her early time, On the way to escape, monsters keep chasing her... She wanna escape, but the end comes before her leaving...

name: Far Ahead
description: You transmigrated back to the 1980s, you decided to start a business and accurately seized every opportunity for success. You hired legendary managers to work for you, allowing your products to dominate both the national and global markets. Eventually, you became a "far ahead" business legend.

name: C21 Steel Battle Chronicles
description: C21 Steel Battle Chronicles is an Action MMORPG in which you can customize your very own robot to determine how it fights in battle. Become a member of the Neo Angel Force and defeat the nefarious Demon Force to restore peace to the Cosmic Renaissance!

name: 30 Days on Ship
description: Take on the role of a castaway on a wrecked container ship. Survive for 30 days, battle storms, hunt animals, build shelter, and maintain your mental health, attempting to endure extreme isolation in the middle of the Pacific. Can you stay alive?

name: 17.waves
description: 17.waves is an online co-op tower defense game for up to four players. Strategize with your teammates to build, upgrade, and maintain your towers to defend your base from hordes of invading aliens.

name: The Dark Thicket
description: You're the village swordcat, and you're gunna save your friends. A retro 3D adventure game with a unique minimalist aesthetic.

name: Necroforge
description: Battle monsters using spells and weapons. Each wave gets tougher, requiring strategy. Inspired by Hexen and Heretic games, this games features dynamic enemy waves, providing a unique survival experience.

name: Arcana Dimension
description: This is the story of two girls, Saki and Kaede, who have been transferred to the magic world of "Ecstasia". In order to return home, the girls engage in mortal combat against "magic weapons". Make use of a wide variety of magic and the cooperation between the two girls to defeat powerful enemies.

name: House Always Wins!
description: House Always WINS! is a Match 3 like card game. Twist and turn to keep the game going for as long as possible and be smart about setting up the game state to earn the maximum amount of points. Play this top ten GMTK 2023 game jam title now - improved, with added content and on Steam.

name: There's a Duck Behind You!
description: A virtual reality action game.

name: Fraudulent Idols
description: Sit back and explore FRAUDULENT IDOLS a Fixed-Camera experience of horror, puzzles, traps, fighting, and boss fights. Deeper levels of STRATA will contain progressively more difficult creatures and hazards. A players quest ends with the defeat of all doubt. Which rests deep in the heart.

name: Tower Defense RPG
description: A Tower Defense RPG. Gain levels, expand your skill tree, find powerful items, solve puzzles, and discover allies as you follow the story of a young kid who battles through time to save worlds.

name: Ys Foliage Ocean in Celceta: Kai
description: Ys Foliage Ocean in Celceta : Kai, the origin of Ys VIII and Ys IX, is now available on Steam! The highly-acclaimed Ys action RPG series is renowned for its simple yet exhilarating battles, clear and dramatic story, and fiery BGM that enhances the battle experience.

name: Molten Winds: Open Editon
description: 3v3 fighting in a fantasy western setting! Level up and upgrade your magic during fights, and best your opponent using simple controls that hide deep choices!

name: Dreadsite Survival
description: Dreadsite Survival is a Third Person with True First Person, Post-Apocalyptic 8K Open World Massively Multiplayer Online Survival Game developed and published by Xi Studios.

name: Dice
description: A dice game. The player selects between "small number" (S), "large number" (L) or "three fives" and proceeds to roll three dices. An extra point is gained when the rolled number of dice corresponds correctly with the selected option.

name: Simon Says
description: A variant of whack-a-mole where the player has to memorize a pattern shown and repeat the pattern correctly to score points, akin to The Simon Game toy from the 1990's.

name: Whack-a-Mole
description: A "whack-a-mole" style game in which the player must use the fire and directional buttons to hit one of the four corresponding targets on the screen. The player loses if either he/she presses the wrong button, or taking too long to press. This game is variously known as "Hammer Attack", "Ghost Hunter" or "Alien Darts" in some packaging manuals. On the top of the screen, a symbol is used to represent the correct/wrong button press, usually "X" and "O", or in some version, a smile or frown.

name: Matching Blocks
description: A matching game consisting of three different shaped blocks appear at the top and bottom of the screen. The upper blocks will descend down and the player must match the lower blocks with its upper counterpart. A less common variant uses Tetris pieces instead of the usual squares.

name: Pneumatic Ball
description: A soccer-like game, where you attempt to get your ball past the moving guard to the top side of the screen.

name: Little Honeybee
description: A combination of both Breakout and the previous shooting games in which players shoot at a predefined block of pixels (which can shoot one of it's pixels at them) without getting shot by one of the blocks from the image.

name: Shooting Filling
description: A shooting game in which the player shoot single blocks to form a complete 10-block line to clear them, akin to the objective of Tetris.

name: Shooting Disappearing
description: Randomly-generated rows of blocks will gradually descend down the screen, and the player must shoot them before they reach the bottom. A variant also exists where the player have to shoot randomly generated blocks instead of rows, and have the ability to gain two shooters at the cost of one life. The player loses if any blocks reach the bottom.

name: Obstacles Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Bilateral Table Tennis
description: A Breakout or Pong inspired game in which the player controls a paddle trying to break through a layer of blocks on the center of the screen.

name: Forsaken Ones
description:
Forsaken Ones: Choose your Fate in an Unrelenting Boss Rush Challenge
Master the art of soulslike combat with a variety of unique characters in Forsaken Ones. Each character has distinct abilities, weapons, and playstyles. Hone your skills with each rebirth, learning from your mistakes and discovering your enemies' weaknesses.
Explore a lore-rich world and uncover the secrets surrounding the Forsaken Ones, powerful entities corrupted by war. Choose your path and fight for redemption in a world torn apart by war.

name: RoboCop Versus the Terminator
description: A cancelled NES game based on the RoboCop Versus The Terminator comic book series. The game is a side-scrolling shooter where you play as RoboCop, shooting through various Terminators and robots on your quest to destroy Skynet.

name: Ascent: Rivals
description: Early alpha by 4 person indie team: a twin-stick, dual engine death-race where anything goes in order to claim victory and fame. Some do it for the adrenaline, others for fame, and some for a shot at escaping poverty — and the majority to watch the ensuing chaos.

name: Assassin's Creed: Codename Invictus
description: As detailed in Ubisoft’s First Half 2022-2023 earnings report, “a team, including For Honor veterans, is currently working on bringing back multiplayer to Assassin’s Creed with a standalone experience through Infinity under the project codename Invictus”.
